name: Space Invaders x64
description:
Use the arrow keys to move your ship around and space bar to fire!  You will have to shoot at asteroids and space ships as well as fight the end level boss!  There are also items that can increase lives that you can collect as well!

Source code can be found here:

https://github.com/opferman/SixtyFourBits/tree/master/Games/SpaceInvaders/AMD64
